text: William Hill (11 June 1945 - 27 July 2020) was a Hong Kong sprinter. He competed in the men's 200 and 400 metres at the 1964 Summer Olympics. Hill died on 27 July 2020, aged 75.Olympian and former Hong Kong 400m record-holder William Hill dies at 75 ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Sprinters Category:Olympians for Hong Kong
title: William Hill (Hong Kong athlete)
